document.heading: Tax Certificate Issuance and Return Duplicating User Charges Act of 1977

history.narrative: Law 2-57, the “Tax Certificate Issuance and Return Duplicating User Charges Act of 1977,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-201, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 8, 1977 and November 22, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 15, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 2-122 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
